game.name: Crazy Ball Adventures
game.description:
Playing with balls offers countless fun opportunities whether you choose the offline or online format! Today we have got you covered with a brand new adventure game where you have to control a ball over the platforms that are full of multiple types of obstacles. You have to put your skills and hand-eye coordination abilities to the test to make your win through some amazing levels in Crazy Ball Adventures. Your amazing performance will depend upon how you balance the ball perfectly.

This ball is very tricky and has a mission to reach the goal platform. But the journey of this cute ball is not going to be easy since it has plenty of obstacles to deal with. Guide your ball towards the path of success while helping it to avoid falling down into the water in this HTML5 platform game! Keep your eyes on the stars and try to grab as many as you can to clear each level with the maximum possible score! Use the arrow keys or WASD to control its direction and cover the distance fast over the platform!

The minimum time you would take to help it reach the goal platform, the higher score will be created in the end of this cool ball game. Use the space key to make your ball jump! There are 10 unique and highly exciting levels to play through and lots of amazing rewards to explore. Try out other free physics games on our website and have a blast with your friends! Complete all levels, create your best score and feel free to share it with your friends on the popular social medial websites, no download required!
